select s.name as subjectname,b.full_name as fullname,
from market_student as m left join subject as s on m.subject_id=s.id left join basic_user_info as b on m.user_id=b.id where m.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(*) as notes, user_id as user_id, time as time, e.nick_name as fullName FROM `market_student` as m LEFT JOIN employee as e on e.id = m.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{propsMap.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{propsMap.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY user_id, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y%m%d')

AND DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y%m%d') like CONCAT('%',#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
